name: tm24
effect: Teaches Thunderbolt to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Thunderbolt to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: DragonBreath)

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: A powerful electric attack that may cause paralysis.
flavor_text.emerald: A powerful electric attack that may cause paralysis.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A strong electrical attack that may also leave the foe paralyzed.
